Articles.Content:
So, not much to say here. On a brand new MacBook Pro 13" with 16GB RAM and a 3Ghz dual-core Core i7, running OSX Yosemite, I open a save file, click on any building, and then the game crashes. Looking through the reports, every time it hangs it says the error was "KERN\_UNPROTECTED\_FAILURE," and the crashed thread was com.apple.mainthread (I don't remember the exact name.) Player.log says nothing of any use.

Mods:

BDArmory

MechJeb

ModuleManager

CollisionFX

Hotrockets
